item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for Connecticut Supports Peter Schiff for U.S. Senate (CT)!

What: Team Leader Confernce Call This Week

When: Wednesday, May 12, 2010 7:00 PM


Hi everyone-


We have an important call we want all team leaders to attend.
The agenda was set at last week's call. Since then some of these
points have had meetups.

Anyone who wants to learn more to help out the campaign, please join the call.


1. Petition signatures - how, when (schedule)
2. Canvassing - with whom, when (schedule)
3. Fundraising - how for big $$
4. May 21st State Convention - when what who
5. Grassroots role in Campaign (only if time this week)


We need to stay on topic this week as all points above are very important
and some are time sensitive.


Possibly a guest speaker this week.

Teleconferne # (516)453-0020, enter 771858638.


Please RSVP

barbara g.
item.name: Schiff for Senate Team Leader Call
